title: What are the lyrics to the theme song to 'Suits'? - Quora

response.answer_text: See the money wanna stayFor your mealGet another piece of pieFor your wife Everybody wanna knowHow it feelEverybody wanna seeWhat it's like I'll even eat a bean pieI don't mindMe and Missy is so early busy busy makin' moneyAlright All step back, I'm 'bout to danceThe greenback boogie Essentially , the version played on the show was adapted and censored specifically for it.
